TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveAssemblyReference extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.TaskExtension

summary.span: 實作 ResolveAssemblyReference 工作。

span.span: Implements the ResolveAssemblyReference task.

summary.span: 請使用專案檔中的 ResolveAssemblyReference 項目，來建立和執行這項工作。

span.span: Use the ResolveAssemblyReference element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [ResolveAssemblyReference 工作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d56d848-b29b-4dff-86a2-0a96c9e4a170)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [ResolveAssemblyReference Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d56d848-b29b-4dff-86a2-0a96c9e4a170).

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，指定是否自動將產生的相依性圖形視為有 App.Config 檔案傳遞給 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the resulting dependency graph is automatically treated as if there were an App.Config file passed in to the property.

value.span: 如果自動將產生的相依性圖形視為有 App.Config 檔案傳遞給 屬性，即為 。

span.span: if the resulting dependency graph is automatically treated as if there were an App.Config file passed in to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 `false`。The default value is `false`. 如需有關這個屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[ResolveAssemblyReference 工作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d56d848-b29b-4dff-86a2-0a96c9e4a170)For more information about this property, see [ResolveAssemblyReference Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d56d848-b29b-4dff-86a2-0a96c9e4a170)

summary.span: 取得或設定要用於搜尋和解析處理序的組件清單，這些組件必須是絕對檔案名稱或專案的相對檔案名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of assemblies, which must be absolute file names or project-relative file names, to use for the search and resolution process.

value.span: 要用於搜尋和解析處理序的組件清單。

span.span: The list of assemblies to use for the search and resolution process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這份清單中的組件會被視為時屬性將 {CandidateAssemblyFiles} 包含做為其中一個要考量的路徑。Assemblies in this list will be considered when the property contains {CandidateAssemblyFiles} as one of the paths to consider.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CopyLocalDependenciesWhenParentReferenceInGac { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值可決定相依性判定方式，以及是否在本機複製相依性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how dependencies are determined, and whether or not a dependency is copied locally.

value.span: 如果當判斷相依性應該會在本機複製，檢查其中完成的專案檔中的父參考是否具有 Private 中繼資料設定。

span.span: if, when determining if a dependency should be copied locally, one of the checks done is to see if the parent reference in the project file has the Private metadata set.

value.span: 如果設定該中繼資料，因此我們將使用的相依性。

span.span: If that metadata is set, we will use that for the dependency as well.

value.span: 如果未設定該中繼資料，則相依性會經歷與父參考相同的檢查。

span.span: If the metadata is not set then the dependency will go through the same checks as the parent reference.

value.span: 其中一個檢查是為了查看參考是否在 GAC 中。

span.span: One of these checks is to see if the reference is in the GAC.

value.span: 如果參考位在 GAC 中，則不會將之複製到本機，這是因為假設它也會位在目標電腦的 GAC 中。

span.span: If a reference is in the GAC then we will not copy it locally as it is assumed it will be in the gac on the target machine as well.

value.span: 不過，這只適用於該特定參考，而不適用於其相依性。

span.span: However this only applies to that specific reference and not its dependencies.

value.span: 這表示專案檔中的參考的本機複製過程可能會有錯，這是由於雖然它位在 GAC 中，但是相依性因為不在 GAC 中，而仍可能會複製到本機上。

span.span: This means a reference in the project file may be copy local false due to it being in the GAC but the dependencies may still be copied locally because they are not in the GAC.

value.span: 這是 RAR 的預設行為，而且會讓這個屬性的預設值變成 true。

span.span: This is the default behavior for RAR and causes the default value for this property to be true.

value.span: 傳回如果我們仍然會檢查專案檔參考，以查看它們是否在 GAC 中且適當地設定它們的本機複製狀態。

span.span: Returns if we will still check project file references to see if they are in the GAC and set their copy local state as appropriate.

value.span: 不過，對於相依性，則不只會確認相依性是否位在 GAC 中，還會確認專案檔中的父參考是否也位在 GAC 中。

span.span: However for dependencies we will not only check to see if they are in the GAC but we will also check to see if the parent reference from the project file is in the GAC.

value.span: 如果專案檔中的父參考位在 GAC 中，則不會在本機複製相依性。

span.span: If the parent reference from the project file is in the GAC then we will not copy the dependency locally.

para.span: 如果有多個父參考，但沒有一個是來自 GAC，則會將本機複製設定為 true。

span.span: If there are multiple parent reference and ANY of them does not come from the GAC then we will set copy local to true.

summary.span: 取得或設定項目清單，這些項目表示包含設定檔完整架構的 XML 檔案。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of items representing XML files that contain the full framework for the profile.

value.span: 表示包含完整的 framework 設定檔的 XML 檔案的項目清單。

span.span: A list of items representing XML files that contain the full framework for the profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不會在這裡，這是針對完整架構的 xml 檔案的位置不 RedistList 資料夾底下的案例。Normally nothing is passed in here, this is for the cases where the location of the xml file for the full framework is not under a RedistList folder. 檔案的格式如下： 等等。Format of the file is like: etc. ```xml // etc. ``` 這份清單中的項目必須指定"FrameworkDirectory"中繼資料與特定架構目錄產生關聯的可轉散發套件清單。Items in this list must specify the "FrameworkDirectory" metadata to associate an redist list with a particular framework directory. 如果關聯則不會進行錯誤會記錄。If the association is not made an error will be logged. 原因是，RAR 中的邏輯會假設如果未設定 FrameworkDirectory，則它會使用目標 framework 目錄。The reason is, The logic in RAR assumes if a FrameworkDirectory is not set it will use the target framework directory.

summary.span: ，代表內含應該位於目標子集中之組件的 XML 檔案清單。

span.span: An that represents a list of XML files that contain assemblies that are expected to be in the target subset.

value.span: XML 檔案的 清單。

span.span: An list of XML files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是檔案的格式：This is the format of the file: ```xml etc. ``` 這份清單中的項目可以選擇性地指定"FrameworkDirectory"中繼資料，以將 InstalledAssemblySubsetTable 與特定架構目錄產生關聯。Items in this list may optionally specify the "FrameworkDirectory" metadata to associate an InstalledAssemblySubsetTable with a particular framework directory. 如果只有單一這個項目，然後這份清單中並沒有"FrameworkDirectory"中繼資料的任何項目會被視為獨立的 （唯一） 值傳遞給這個設定中繼資料。If there is only a single TargetFrameworkDirectories element, then any items in this list that do not have the "FrameworkDirectory" metadata will be treated as though the metadata is set to the lone (unique) value passed to TargetFrameworkDirectories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性，才能判斷`CopyLocal`所產生項目的狀態。This property is required to determine the `CopyLocal` status for resulting items. 如果未指定此屬性，將會有任何產生的項目`CopyLocal`的值`true`除非明確`Private`中繼資料值`true`其來源項目上。If this property is not specified, no resulting items will be have a `CopyLocal` value of `true` unless they explicitly have a `Private` metadata value of `true` on their source item.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ WarnOrErrorOnTargetArchitectureMismatch { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串值，這個值表示目標處理器架構與主要參考架構不相符時的行為。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value specifying the behavior when a mismatch between the target processor architecture and the architecture of a primary reference.

summary.span: 當這是 "Error" 時，就會因為不相符而記錄錯誤。

span.span: When this is "Error", an error will be logged for a mismatch.

summary.span: 當這是 "Warning" 時，就會因為不相符而記錄警告。

span.span: When this is "Warning", a warning will be logged for a mismatch.

summary.span: 當這是 "None" 時，就不會因為不相符而記錄錯誤或警告。

span.span: When this is "None", no error or warning will be logged for a mismatch.

value.span: 「 錯誤 」、 「 警告 」 或 「 無 」 的字串值。

span.span: A string value of "Error", "Warning" or "None".
